Introduction

Lee Chang-sub is a South Korean singer under Fantagio. He is the lead vocalist of the South Korean boy group, BTOB. Lee Changsub was born in Suwon, Gyeonggi-do, South Korea. He studied Practical Music at Howon University with group-mate Lim Hyunsik.

Changsub debuted as a member of BTOB on March 21, 2012, with the digital single "Insane".

He made his solo debut on December 11, 2018 with the mini album Mark.

He enlisted on January 14, 2019. On August 21, 2020 Changsub completed his military service.
